strategy_reasoning: Translating technical backend updates (GPUs, dependency removal, refactoring) into a cozy 'Spring Cleaning & Level Up' narrative fits the Stardew Valley/Unpacking aesthetic perfectly. It makes infrastructure changes feel like satisfying gameplay progression.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen. A cute 8-bit computer monitor sitting on a wooden desk with a small potted plant. The screen glows with soft lime green (#ecf874) text. Soft lavender and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Unpacking. Text on screen in pixel font: 'WEEKLY LEVEL UP'. Nostalgic, clean, emotionally warm.
images.description: Cover image setting the cozy dev-log vibe.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee character lifting a glowing server rack that looks like a treasure chest. Representing 8x L40 GPUs. Soft mint green and lime green (#ecf874) background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, magical sparkles. Like a power-up in a retro game. Cozy, cute, powerful.
images.description: Visualizing the massive GPU upgrade as a cute character gaining a power-up.

images.prompt: Retro RPG inventory screen UI. A pixel hand selecting a 'Cleanup' broom icon. Removing an item labeled 'Nix'. The inventory looks organized and clean. Soft pastel colors, lime green (#ecf874) selection border. Cozy vibes like Stardew Valley menu. Satisfying organization.
images.description: Visualizing the removal of Nix dependency as inventory management/cleanup.

images.prompt: A glowing magical pixel art banana floating in the center. It represents the 'nanobanana' model. Sparkles and soft light beams around it. Lavender and lime green (#ecf874) gradient background. Chunky 8-bit style, cute and funny. Retro gaming item pickup aesthetic.
images.description: Highlighting the switch to the 'nanobanana' model with a literal pixel banana.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images showing a computer workspace, a bee lifting a server rack, a retro inventory screen, and a glowing magical banana.
